comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "„Mrs. Nelson O'Shaugnessy, wife of the former Unites States chargé d'affaires in Mexico, returned on the Laffayette. She has been inspecting Hospitals in Paris, Rome, Vienna, Berlin and London since her husband came back to his country last July. Mr. O'Shaugnessy met his wife at Quarantine.“ (New-York tribune., December 07, 1915, Page 3, at the end of the article about W. Warren)

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: pennylrichardsca and B-59:  Thanks for providing more info. on Edith O'Shaughnessy.  We will include some of it in the description next time we update.
